segment.source: Group Policy preferences are less strict than Group Policy settings, based on:
segment.target: Group Policy preferences are less strict than Group Policy settings, based on:

segment.target: Group Policy preferences

segment.source: Group Policy settings
segment.target: Group Policy settings

segment.source: Enforcement
segment.target: Enforcement

segment.source: Not enforced
segment.target: Not enforced

segment.source: Has the user interface turned on
segment.target: Has the user interface turned on

segment.source: Can only be refreshed or applied once
segment.target: Can only be refreshed or applied once

segment.source: Enforced
segment.target: Enforced

segment.source: Has the user interface turned off
segment.target: Has the user interface turned off

segment.source: Can be refreshed multiple times
segment.target: Can be refreshed multiple times

segment.source: Flexibility
segment.target: Flexibility

segment.source: Lets you create preference items for registry settings, files, and folders.
segment.target: Lets you create preference items for registry settings, files, and folders.

segment.source: Requires app support
segment.target: Requires app support

segment.source: Needs you to create Administrative Templates for new policy settings
segment.target: Needs you to create Administrative Templates for new policy settings

segment.source: Won't let you create policy settings to manage files and folders
segment.target: Won't let you create policy settings to manage files and folders

segment.source: Local Group Policy
segment.target: Local Group Policy

segment.source: Not available
segment.target: Not available

segment.source: Available
segment.target: Available

segment.source: Awareness
segment.target: Awareness

segment.source: Supports apps that aren't Group Policy-aware
segment.target: Supports apps that aren't Group Policy-aware

segment.source: Requires apps to be Group Policy-aware
segment.target: Requires apps to be Group Policy-aware

segment.source: Storage
segment.target: Storage

segment.source: Overwrites the original settings
segment.target: Overwrites the original settings

segment.source: Removing the preference doesn't restore the original setting
segment.target: Removing the preference doesn't restore the original setting

segment.source: Doesn't overwrite the original settings
segment.target: Doesn't overwrite the original settings

segment.source: Stored in the Policy branches of the registry
segment.target: Stored in the Policy branches of the registry

segment.source: Removing the setting restores the original setting
segment.target: Removing the setting restores the original setting

segment.source: Targeting and filtering
segment.target: Targeting and filtering

segment.source: Targeting is specific, with a user interface for each type of targeting item
segment.target: Targeting is specific, with a user interface for each type of targeting item

segment.source: Supports targeting at the individual preference item level
segment.target: Supports targeting at the individual preference item level

segment.source: Filtering is based on Windows Management Instrumentation (WMI), and requires writing WMI queries
segment.target: Filtering is based on Windows Management Instrumentation (WMI), and requires writing WMI queries

segment.source: Supports filtering at the Group Policy Object (GPO) level
segment.target: Supports filtering at the Group Policy Object (GPO) level

segment.source: For more information about Group Policy preferences, see the Group Policy Settings Reference for Windows and Windows Server.
segment.target: For more information about Group Policy preferences, see the Group Policy Settings Reference for Windows and Windows Server.
